Class MoveGenie

  • java.lang.Object
    • MoveGenie

  • public class MoveGenie
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class MoveGenie. Given game information will figure out what move to play.

    • Method Detail

      • getMove

        public static Move getMove(BoardInterface currBoard,
           int maxDepth,
           java.util.List<Player> players,
           Player target,
           int toWin)
        Function to calculate the best Move for the Player target.
        Parameters:
        currBoard - BoardInterface showing the current state of the board
        maxDepth - integer value limiting the depth of the search
        players - List of Players in the order of the play
        target - Player for which the best Move will be calculated
        toWin - integer number of tokens in a line required for a Player to win
        Returns:
        best Move for the Player

      • calculateScore

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> calculateScore()
        Function to calculate individual scores for each of the Players.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing integer value scores for each of the Players

      • minMaxSearch

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> minMaxSearch(int depth,
                                                  Player currTurn)
        Function to return a list of scores for each Players based on minmax search algorithm.
        Parameters:
        depth - integer value limiting the depth of search
        currTurn - Player for which score is chosen at the current tree level
        Returns:
        ArrayList of scores for each Players at the given depth

      • alphaBetaSearch

        private static int alphaBetaSearch(int alpha,
                  int beta,
                  int depth,
                  Player currTurn,
                  Player target)
        Function to return a list of scores for each Players based on alpha-beta search algorithm.
        Parameters:
        alpha - probable minimum integer score
        beta - probable maximum integer score
        depth - integer value limiting the depth of search
        currTurn - Player for which score is chosen at the current tree level
        target - Player using getMove() function
        Returns:
        ArrayList of scores for each Players at the given depth

      • getTokensScore

        private static int getTokensScore(int noOfTokens)
        Returns the score for the line of tokens given the number of the tokens.
        Parameters:
        noOfTokens - integer number of tokens in a line
        Returns:
        integer score

        Returns:
